entry.title: Docs Up-To-Date!
entry.summary: We have successfully updated the documentation so it now contains all Libs MacroScriptingMod currently features. We are planing on adding some example-scripts and explanations very soon.
entry.content:
We have successfully updated the documentation so it now contains all Libs MacroScriptingMod currently features. We are planing on adding some example-scripts and explanations very soon.
Of course we will also keep on updading the documentation whenever we update MacroScriptingMod.

entry.title: Docs launched!
entry.summary: Today I can happily announce, that we launched our documentation. It's missing basically everything but it is now online.
entry.content: Today I can happily announce, that we launched our documentation. It's missing basically everything but it is now online.
